overview:
Besides having a passion for entrepreneurs and startups, David worked at Google from 2000 to 2006 as a Director, where he was hired as the first international executive to lead the sales, operations, and business development efforts in Asia, Europe and Latin America. He formed the first international partnerships, launched many of Google’s global offices, and hired the initial key management teams, establishing Google’s overseas revenue base. Eventually, he went on to head up Google’s Asia-Pacific presence. His accomplishments have been featured in Forbes and Business Week magazines. Prior to this he’s worked in various careers in the internet industry and corporate finance. David is currently an angel investor and advisor to various VC’s and startups in the US and Asia and resides in Palo Alto, California.

BusinessWeek article: http://bit.ly/bt5EKE
